targets.query: SELECT sum("value")  FROM "mdt_filesinfo_used" WHERE "mdt_index" = 'MDT0000' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "mdt_filesinfo_used" WHERE "mdt_index" = 'MDT0001' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "mdt_filesinfo_used" WHERE "mdt_index" = 'MDT0003' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m) fill(null)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "mdt_filesinfo_used" WHERE "mdt_index" = 'MDT0003' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "mdt_filesinfo_used" WHERE "mdt_index" = 'MDT0003' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m) fill(null)

rows.title: Capacity and Inode Usage of Lustre

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "aggregation.cpu-average.cpu.system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "md_stats" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "optype" fill(null)

Lustre Top Metadata Activity Per USER

rows.title: IME Aggregated CPU uages and PFS Operation

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "ime_nvm_MBs" WHERE "rw" = 'write' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT 100 - mean(value) FROM "ime_PCT_Free" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)
